game.name: Nevrosa: Rescape
game.categories: Single-player, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Nevrosa 2025 is a meticulously crafted VR puzzle/escape room game where players must solve numerous puzzles, battle mysterious creatures, and uncover a new Misty World.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Nevrosa 2025 is a meticulously crafted VR puzzle/escape room game where players must solve numerous puzzles, battle mysterious creatures, and uncover a new Misty World.
